posts.post_title: WTB S74 silks of Carrigan & Criger
posts.post_content:
Looking for Carrigan and Criger, preferably with backings but ok without.

I am also looking to upgrade my backed versions of Collins, Murphy, Schaefer and Wallace.

Thanks,

John
